metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7664 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In elfutils 0.175, a negative-sized memcpy is attempted in elf_cvt_note in libelf/note_xlate.h because of an incorrect overflow check. Crafted elf input causes a segmentation fault, leading to denial of service (program crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> the vulnerable code was introduced in version 0.173.

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4').
